sub_title: Managing Partner / Founder Xtra Mile Recruitment
summary:
Xtra Mile Recruitment is onderscheidend in het werven van tactische en strategische IT-functies. Voor vaste posities en interim opdrachten. Voor lijnfuncties en topspecialisten. Bijvoorbeeld: CxO’s, (senior) managementposities, Portfolio-, Programma- en Projectmanagement, Architectuur, IT-security en IT-regie.

Onderscheidend vanwege de volgende aanpak en filosofie:
1. Werving wordt uitgevoerd door ex-CIO’s met >25 jaar senior managementervaring bij eindklanten en serviceproviders. Wij zijn hierdoor uitstekende gesprekspartners voor opdrachtgever en kandidaat.
2. Wij werven op basis van ‘no cure, no pay’, en non-exclusiviteit. U loopt dus geen enkel (financieel) risico.
3. Wij sluiten bij voorkeur aan op uw processen en condities. Dat werkt wel zo gemakkelijk.
4. Wij bieden meerdere geschikte kandidaten aan per vacature/ opdracht.
5. Als een benoemde kandidaat op een vaste positie uw organisatie binnen zes maanden op eigen initiatief verlaat, voeren wij de procedure van de bijbehorende functie opnieuw uit, maar dan kosteloos.

Bent u nieuwsgierig geworden? Voor meer informatie over Xtra Mile Recruitment en een overzicht van de openstaande vacatures, verwijs ik u graag naar https://xtramilerecruitment.nl/. Meerdere aansprekende organisaties zijn u voorgegaan! Wij gaan the extra mile!

===

Xtra Mile Recruitment is distinctive in recruiting tactical and strategic IT positions. For permanent positions and interim assignments. For line functions and top specialists. For example: CxOs, (senior) management positions, Portfolio, Program and Project management, Architecture, IT security and IT management.

Distinctive because of the following approach and philosophy:
1. Recruitment is done by ex-CIOs with >25 years of senior management experience at end customers and service providers. This makes us excellent sparring partners for both client and candidate.
2. We recruit according to 'no cure, no pay' and non-exclusivity. You therefore do not run any (financial) risk.
3. We prefer to match your processes and conditions. Easy to deal with!
4. We offer several suitable candidates for each vacancy/assignment.
5. If an appointed candidate to a permanent position leaves your organization on his own initiative within six months, we will carry out the procedure for the corresponding position again, but then free of charge.

Have you become curious? For more information about Xtra Mile Recruitment and an overview of the vacancies, I would like to refer you to https://xtramilerecruitment.nl/. Several appealing organizations have preceded you!
We go the extra mile!

education.field_of_study: Dual degree with Vlerick Business School

school.name: HU University of Applied Sciences Utrecht (Hogeschool Utrecht)
Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the Global Digital Strategy, the Digital Transformation and Global IT (16 countries) with main results:

Digital:
- Set up a Digital Strategy for the next three years
- Drafted a Digital Roadmap with initiatives to become a Digital frontrunner in the industry
- 5 initiatives of this Roadmap implemented (e.g. AR for Rental App, BIM (Building Information Modeling), QR codes and Digital Collaboration Platform. This has contribited in Riwal winning the Digital Development Award during the 2021 International Awards for Powered Access summit.
- Drafted and executed a Digital Transformation Plan
- Provided insight in how to increase our digital maturity, based on the results of a Digital Readiness Assessment in collaboration with KPN
- Provided insight and prepared a Business Case in how to become a data driven organization, based on the results of a Data Assessment, in collaboration with DIKW. Initiatives started in Q2 2019
- Build a IT Development Team in Dubai to develop Apps, Websites and Portals at Group level

IT:
- Implemented Portfolio Management to focus and to set the right priorities for all changes. We went back from 72 to 13 initiatives in 2019
- Implemented Agile/ Scrum, in collaboration with the Agile Scrum Group to execute our projects
- Improved the security of our IT landscape by implementing solutions, like Mobile Threat Protection, Advanced Threat Analytics and WireX
- Restructured the IT organization, including the implementation of IT Governance across all countries.
- Improved the quality of IT Finance for all countries
- Realized significant IT cost savings (about 10 percent of the annual budget at Group level)
- Implemented a Target Operating Model to support our ERP system at Group level
- Executed an IT Infrastructure consolidation program to go back from 2 to 1 IT Infrastructure provider
profile_positions.title: Group Digital Director (interim)

profile_positions.description:
Focus on Turn Around Management at Executive level. Member of Customer Core Team, Member of Innovation Board at Executive Level, also participating in round table sessions at Executive level.

Results:
- Turned around the innovation process for one of the largest Insurance companies in the Netherlands, led to the instalment of the Innovation Board (I was also a member), and to potential several innovative opportunities with a total contract value of more than €50M
- For the EIB in Luxembourg I managed a liability to great customer satisfaction and I prepared the successful final negotiations 
- Implemented a Risk Management tool (PARMA) for Atos BTN, led to reliable and accurate Risk Delivery Dashboards for all contracts in the Benelux and the Nordics

Remarks customers:
- EIB: "During the holiday season, our thoughts turn gratefully to those who supported us in delivering the best service possible to the EIB, it is in this spirit that I say thank you for your continued support and partnership this year."
profile_positions.title: Client Delivery Executive

profile_positions.description:
- P&L responsible for all outsourced Managed Services contracts:
1) for banks, insurers and pension funds in the Netherlands
2) for all customers (also non-Financials) in Finland
3) for all Mainframe contracts
- Turn Around Management on liabilities/escalations
- Led Delivery teams, delivering Services >€150M annually
- Member of dealteams to attract new customers
- Track lead to improve the overall Customer Experience

Results:
- turned arround an almost lost deal (KAS Bank) into a winning one, led to a huge improved P&L
- recovered the financial performance in Finland, led to an improved Operational Margin from -13% to +8%
- extended contracts for existing customers with a TCV >€400M, led to an increased revenue and operational margin
- improved the overall customer satisfaction for my customers from 5,2 to 8,0, led to more satisfied customers and to more business opportunities
- a personal average score (8.8) from my top 5 customers, led to trusted relationships

Remarks customers:
- Achmea: "In the crisis situation we were in, transparency was key. In that sense, Kees always showed the good example, even if the content was less beautiful. This brought us the fastest to the desired result."
- ING: "Now that the dust is settling, at least on the performance issues we have been facing since mid of last week, I would like to express my appreciation, and I am sure that many ING colleagues share the same view, for the work the ATOS teams under your steer/guidance has performed. The progress made in solving these major issues has been impressive and your leadership has been instrumental to come to that result."
- JDE: "Over the last weeks we made steps in the right direction. Dedication and hard work paid off to date. I would like to inform you that we are very delighted with the commitment that Kees has given to bring us where we are now. Kees has a positive drive and is pragmatic to make it happen – personally very content with that spirit."
profile_positions.title: Director Managed Services - Financial Services

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for all IT activities for Bank Mendes Gans (BMG), an ING entity. BMG is a niche bank for liquidity and information management services, providing integrated customized solutions for corporate companies around the globe.

Results:
- professionalized the overall IT, led to a high score from the Dutch National Bank on their assessment of the full IT scope
- outsourced all IT Infrastructure activities to ING OPS&IT Banking, led to annual cost savings of around 35% of the IT budget
- implemented a Service Organization and a Demand Supply Governance model, led to smooth Service Management processes and a better alignment with my business partners
- professionalized all IT Service Management processes, led to the certification to CobiT level 3 (audited by Quint Wellington Redwood)
- member Management Board that increased the annual revenue from €50M to €140M
- managed Operational Risk and Non-Financial Risk, led to 100% score on KPI’s for Risk and on optimal Capital Risk
- solved all Critical and High Risk items in time.

Special remark:
On 1 March 2012 I was appointed as Executive Vice President. Remarks of the Supervisory Board: “This major step is well earned and reflects our recognition for Kees’ constant contribution to the realization of Bank Mendes Gans’ strategy and objectives since he joined us in 2007”.
profile_positions.title: CIO / Executive Vice President (Bank Mendes Gans)

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for about 300 generic applications and tools within ING OPS&IT Banking. The department counted about 110 employees (100 in the Netherlands and 10 in Belgium). Led a team of 3 department managers and 2 secretaries

Main achievements: Led a successful Taskforce which had to improve the quality of the Data Centers of ING. As member of the Steering Committee, I reported to the CIO of ING Group.
profile_positions.title: Head of Generic Tooling (ING/OPS&IT Banking)

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the implementation of all changes in the Data Centres of ING (the Netherlands, and Belgium). Within IT Infrastructure I was also responsible for IT Service Management and Tooling. The department counted about 100 employees (70 in the Netherlands and 30 in Belgium). I led a team of 3 department managers and 2 secretaries.

Main achievements: next to my job I was successful as domain program manager for a program called 'IT Transformation'. This program reduced legacy, improved Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery, implemented end-to-end Configuration Management solutions and laid the necessary foundation for the quality of IT services (Service Management, Change Management, Release Management, License Management and Life Cycle Management).
profile_positions.title: Head of Change and Implementation (ING/OPS&IT Banking)

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for Change Management, Business Architecture and Governance for the Value Chains ‘General Lending’ and ‘Structured Finance’. These Value Chains had a worldwide scope with focus on the Netherlands, Belgium and Poland. The department counted 12 program managers, 2 business architects, 1 governance officer (program office) and 1 secretary. Besides my job I filled in different roles, such as:
• Chairman of the Change Advisory Team for the Value Chains mentioned
• Member of the Value Chain meetings on tactical and operational level

Main achievement: the Value Chains were up and running in no time. One of the most important reasons was that there was trust between all entities involved (Business, Operations and IT) based on earlier cooperation.
profile_positions.title: Head of Program Management

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for all projects and maintenance of IT Securities Retail for Postbank and ING Bank. I led a team of 4 team leaders, 2 project managers and 1 secretary. Besides my job I filled in different roles, such as:
• Initiator of Value Chain Management in the OPS&IT organization.
• Delegated sponsor to implement Prince2 within the OPS&IT organization
• Member of the Application Committee within the European domain of Securities
• Member of the Steering Committee to improve the internal processes
• Member of an working group to set up scenario planning
• Deputy of the director IS SWB during his absence

Main achievements:
- Creator and initiator of Value Chain Management within ING. A concept that ensured that all domains started working together end-to-end (Business-Operations-IT) instead of in the existing silos. Value Chains have been set up for all domains.
- Changed the IT Securities department from mediocre into very well performing. This was recognized by the DNB because they increased the rating for IT Securities. Reduced the number of FTE from 350 FTE when I started to 180, decreased the number of incidents with 80%, etc.
profile_positions.title: Head BPI/AM Securities (ING/OPS&IT)

profile_positions.description: Leading the section for Application Development and responsible for all projects and programmes within the overall domain of IT Securities.
profile_positions.title: Head BPI Securities

profile_positions.description: Managing complex IT programmes for Application Development
profile_positions.title: Senior Program Manager

profile_positions.description: Leading IT projects for customers of RAET, like Bruna and AMEV (now a.s.r.).
profile_positions.title: Project Leader / System Analyst

profile_positions.description: Programming in COBOL and DataFlex for IBM Mainframe and IBM System/36.
profile_positions.title: Software Programmer / System Analyst
